original_text: Then he shall go out to the altar that is before the Lord and make atonement for it, and shall take some of the blood of the bull and some of the blood of the goat, and put it on the horns of the altar all around.
korean_text: 그는 여호와 앞 제단으로 나와서 그것을 위하여 속죄할지니 곧 그 수송아지의 피와 염소의 피를 가져다가 제단 귀퉁이 뿔들에 바르고

sentences.original_text: Then he shall go out to the altar
and shall take some of the blood of the bull
and some of the blood of the goat
and put it on the horns of the altar all around
